title: Help draw the world’s most collaborative animation.
cta: Help draw the world’s most collaborative animation.
definition:
Your contribution will just take a few seconds.
It’s like the game of telephone, but visual.
statsWaiting: people are waiting for their turn.
stepNotify:
How do you want to be notified of your turn?
choose one or both
thanks: Thanks for joining! We’ll be in touch soon.
issue: There was an issue. Please try again later.
messageLi: When it is your turn to draw
playground: While you wait, you can make your own little animations.
task: Please trace the last person’s drawing as best you can.
